alert.note: Alert for Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 1:55AM CDT until May 09 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CAMERON COUNTY... At 154 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located Bayview moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Los Fresnos, Rio Hondo, Port Of Brownsville, Laureles, Brownsville, Palmer Laasko Elementary, Laguna Vista Police Department, Los Fresnos City Offices, Library Memorial Middle School and Lozano. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
